name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 26, a woman in Shanghai posted a video revealing that on August 24, she was molested by a man who exposed his genitals while riding on a bus. With the help of the driver, she caught the suspect who was trying to escape. The police have opened a case for investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 26, in Xi'an (Released), a netizen posted a video saying that a large truck parked on the roadside was full of rotten apples, stinking to high heaven, and was supplying the juice factory opposite.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the relevant information search, it is found that using rotten apples to make juice is also a "consensus in the industry" just like mixing oil tankers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 27, a photo of the opening ceremony of Tsinghua University Graduate School circulated online showed that Tsinghua University admitted nearly 10,000 graduate students in 2024, 40% of whom were party members.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 27, teachers in Lintong District, Xi'an, who were owed wages, protested at the gate of the Lintong District Education Bureau.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 25, a blogger posted a video saying that he had exposed that the battery pack of Xiaopeng Motors had been flooded. As a result, the video was removed from the platform by Xiaopeng’s people and was banned from playback.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 25, at the Beijing World Robot Conference, some manufacturers hired real models to pretend to be simulated robots for performances. However, the manufacturers did not clearly explain to the audience that these were real models. As a result, the audience thought they were robots and began to touch the models. Some models even had assistants beside them to touch up their makeup, wipe their sweat, and blow fans.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 27, Hangzhou police confirmed that the patriotic internet celebrity "Tietou" who had urinated at the Yasukuni Shrine has been taken into custody by the police on suspicion of extortion and the relevant case is being processed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A makeup artist reveals the process of applying makeup to a model who plays a robot.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 27, the Economic Observer published an article revealing that data from the Beijing Statistics Bureau showed that in the first half of 2024, the total profit of Beijing's large-scale catering industry (i.e. annual revenue of more than 10 million yuan) was 180 million yuan, a year-on-year decrease of 88.8%, and the profit margin was as low as 0.37%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 27, when US National Security Advisor Sullivan visited China, the US Embassy issued a statement announcing that it would intensify efforts to make those who support Russia's war and deny Ukraine's cultural identity pay a new price. Sanctions will be imposed on 400 entities and individuals. Sanctions will be imposed on those who evade and circumvent sanctions, including entities of the People's Republic of China and those that support Russia's future energy production and export.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Gu Ailing caused controversy again because she liked a comment.
This comment said that the Chinese who bullied her were all unemployed vagrants who were barking dogs. Gu Ailing immediately liked it.
Later, someone found out that this comment might have been written by her own account.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 26, in Qingdao, Shandong, leaflets were distributed outside the city government, calling on Qingdao Mayor Zhao Haozhi to get out of Qingdao if he did not continue to govern the city according to the law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 27, at Jinxia Sunshine Classic Garden in Zhangjiagang City, a car driving too fast hit two electric bikes crossing the road.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 27, the front-page headline of the Yangtze River Daily was: The Chinese should point out a direction and let foreigners follow.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 26, at the gate of Chenzhou Municipal Government, the owners of the unfinished Jinkejun real estate project in Chenzhou City, Hunan Province, defended their rights. 
The owner said that the entire real estate project was sold out in 2021. The government did not supervise and the developer took away sales funds of up to 900 million yuan. The houses were not delivered one year after the deadline. The people defended their rights many times, but the government still did nothing. Officials protected each other. This is what they say is serving the people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 22, the Chinese Navy's Peace Ark hospital ship arrived in Cape Town, South Africa, providing free medical care for the South African people for a week. As of August 27, more than 1,300 people have been treated.
Netizens have asked: "When will this medical ship come to China?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 26, the CPC Central Committee and the State Council issued a draft opinion, announcing that they would safeguard teachers’ educational disciplinary power and support teachers in actively disciplining students.
On August 27, Xinhua News Agency published an editorial: “Safeguarding the educational disciplinary power and the right to discipline, and eliminating the “powerlessness” of some teachers”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, some netizens have discovered that the Anhui government affairs software "Anhui Affairs" has changed the original Alipay login entrance to login using an online certificate and Internet number.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 27, a WeChat chat record circulated online. The video showed that a netizen was blocked for posting a photo of a car that caught fire while charging, on the grounds of "pornographic traffic diversion."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 26, Gao Zhikai responded to the controversy surrounding the Al Jazeera program, saying that he would rather suffer criticism than not tell China's story well. If you think you can do it, then go ahead. If you don't, but think Gao Zhikai is okay, then support me.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 7, students from Wugang No. 2 Middle School in Wugang City, Shaoyang City, Hunan Province, published an article accusing Wugang No. 2 Middle School of starting school early and claiming that the school building had been locked and would not be unlocked until the normal start of school. They also pointed out that the school had engaged in corruption. They demanded that the principal, Zhou Xiaojun, disclose the relevant expenditure information for the construction of the gymnasium and accept supervision from all sides.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Hangzhou police reported that in May 2024, "Tietou" and others threatened to expose the scandal and demanded hundreds of grams of gold from a live streamer, promising to protect him after delivery. After many negotiations, the live streamer paid him a large sum of money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of August 27, a local child missing alert was issued in Canada. A 5-year-old Chinese child was missing, and the suspect was a 65-year-old woman named Ruixue Yang. According to a search, Yang Ruixue was a Beijing Municipal People's Congress representative.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Cultural Confidence"
Some netizens discovered that the translation used on the cover of the "English" textbook of the Beijing Normal University high school textbook has changed to the pinyin "YINGYU" instead of "English".
